title: Urban roundup: new Kask helmets, VentaPak commuter bag spacer & Alpen Bike Capsule
content:
Urban bike commuters don’t always get the most cutting-edge technology, but there are plenty of ways to improve the bike-to-work beyond just building e-bikes to flatten the hills. Kask has two new city bike helmets – the Urban R & Moebius, each of which combines safety, style, and a bit of unique commuter tech. Then, […]

The post Urban roundup: new Kask helmets, VentaPak commuter bag spacer & Alpen Bike Capsule appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
